name: Souls & Accounting: Employee Files
description:
Souls & Accounting: Employee Files randomly generates polaroids of corporate demons, along with their employee dossier. Created for the 2015 Procedural Generation Jam (#procjam) that ran for a week in November, consider this a small proof of concept for the full Souls & Accounting demonic corporate management game to be developed by Nonadecimal Creative in 2016.

To follow the further development of Souls & Accounting, check @Nonadecimal for updates on Twitter.
